name: files.getUploadURLExternal
desc: Gets a URL for an edge external file upload

alt_txt.example: Aerial view of the Bixby Bridge and coastline of the Big Sur area in California

filename.desc: Name of the file being uploaded.

length.desc: Size in bytes of the file being uploaded.

snippet_type.desc: Syntax type of the snippet being uploaded.

errors.alt_txt_too_large: Description for the image is longer than the limit of 1000 character
errors.file_upload_size_restricted: The size of provided file is too large, as the team has restricted uploads of large files.
errors.file_uploads_disabled: Team has disabled all file uploads.
errors.missing_argument: A required argument was not provided. Typically only occurs when the `length` provided is 0.
errors.snippet_too_large: The provided `length` is too large to create a snippet, which are limited to 1MB.
errors.storage_limit_reached: File storage limit has been reached. This occurs when free teams have uploaded 5GB of files.
errors.unknown_snippet_type: The provided `snippet_type` is not a supported type.
errors.unknown_subtype: The provided `subtype` is not a supported type.
